1370: Tijs moved to Cingel.C.0 after marriage.
Got married to Riet at age 34 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Riet, Itsburgis, at age 34.
1371: Had a daughter with Riet, Aleydis, at age 35.
1372: Had a son with Riet, Suam, at age 36.
1373: Had a son with Riet, Galo, at age 37.
1375: Had a son with Riet, Geykonis, at age 39.
1378: Had a daughter with Riet, Brundonis, at age 42.
1379: Lost his wife Riet while she was giving birth to Hille in 1379.
Became caretaker of Itsburgis, Aleydis, Suam, Galo, Geykonis, Brundonis, Hille at age 44.
1381: Lost daughter Hille when Hille was 3 years old.
